column4: Blues - I use firefox because I depend on the plug ins. But I switch back between it and Chrome

brown - Naw, not always. lxsplit and truecrypt are two examples of very good programs that aren't canonical but don't hurt the system. It'd be a shame to not take advantage of those utilities for fear of them hurting your computer.
linux is more challenging in a lot of ways but that's what I like about it
